document_data.name: Janxar Dhoarn
document_data.mainbody: '''Janxar Dhoarn''' was a male [[half-elf]] [[fighter]] of [[Alaghôn]] in [[Turmish]]. He was the richest mercenary captain in the city and a senior member of the [[Moonstars]] in [[1370 DR]].
document_data.Description: Janxar was an always-smiling broad-shouldered giant of a man.
document_data.Personality: Janxar was well known for his honesty and integrity, which made him stand out in a land like Turmish, where disloyalty seemed commonplace.
document_data.Activities: He could gather an army at once if needed by [[Khelben "Blackstaff" Arunsun]] for the Moonstars. One of his primary jobs for the Moonstars was to train new agents in fighting techniques.
